title: A solid-state p–n tandem dye-sensitized solar cell
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,1004-1011
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01461D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sina Wrede, Bin Cai, Fangwen Cheng, Malin B. Johansson, Tomas Kubart, Carl Hägglund, Haining Tian
First demonstration of a solid-state p–n tandem dye-sensitized solar cell (t-DSC) shows a substantial open-circuit voltage which holds great promise for a wide range of applications, particularly in the fields of photovoltaics and photoelectrochemical devices.
